comment.author: 55177298@N08
comment._content: My Great Great Grandfather built at least four buildings in the foreground. My Great Great Grandmother ran the building latterly known as Argyll House as the Kilcreggan Temperance Hotel ( first to the left of the pier), My Father has made some comments on 4 Kilcreggan postcards which show more detailed shots of the village. Alan Fleming www.rosneathpeninsula.org.uk/history/postcards/postcards-...
